QuestData.Title: The Missing Caravan
QuestData.Description: I've got a problem and you look like you're just the $r for the job!$b$bA trade shipment was supposed to arrive yesterday, but it's nowhere to be found. I'm running low on merchandise here and I need somebody to go find out what happened!$b$bIf I were to guess, I'd say the saberon are probably involved. Those brutes have been a pain in our side ever since we got here!$b$bSearch for the wagon on the road near Sabermaw and hurry! Time is money!
QuestData.RewardText: <Greezlex lifts his head to look up at you from the ground.>$b$b...No! Don't take me... I... wait...$b$bYou aren't a saberon... did Pyxni send you?$b$b
